description:
The ultimate battle royale for divinity has begun. High schoolers must use their unique powers to compete against each other for the coveted title "God." But as each brawl becomes more vicious than the last, alliances are formed and betrayals take place. Who will emerge victorious and claim their godly throne?
Source: Crunchyroll
Note: The first two episodes received an advance release on Fuji TV`s YouTube channel on September 30, 2023. The regular TV broadcast started on October 5, 2023.

REGULAR.description:
One summer day, a boy named Goro who`s bored with life receives a mysterious message on his phone: "Please record your wish." Goro jokingly says a wish out loud. Then, everything changes for him, and the KamiErabi battle to become God of the world begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare ni mo Kizukarenai, Dareshimo ga Yume ni Miru Basho de
Unnoticed by Anyone, in the Place of Which Everyone Dreams
誰にも気付かれない, 誰しもが夢に見る場所で

REGULAR.description:
Goro used his new karma-twisting powers to resurrect Honoka. The two of them form an alliance along with his friend and fellow God candidate Akitsu, and Honoka provides them with an explanation of some of the details of their new status as candidates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aitsu ga Tsuyoi toka, Yowai toka
Is He Strong, Is He Weak?
あいつが強いとか, 弱いとか

REGULAR.description:
Despite forming an alliance, Lall warns Goro to remain wary of Akitsu and Honoka. But Goro trusts his good friend Akitsu, in particular, and even when he steals his smartphone, Goro writes it off as just a prank. But when he finds him at their arcade...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Omaette, Saikou no Tomodachi Da
You`re the Finest of Friends
お前って, 最高の友達だ

REGULAR.description:
Honoka tells a depressed Goro about Little Angel, who can resolve any problem a person might have. Chika from the Science Club joins in the hunt, and they discover that Tatsuya is Little Angel. But Tatsuya is already the target of Koki the delinquent...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sore Sunawachi, Watashitachi wa Doushi, to Iu Koto
What That Means Is, We`re Kindred Spirits
ソレすなわち, 私たちは同志, ということ

REGULAR.description:
After a late-night SOS call from Chika, Goro heads to school. There he finds Koki fighting off a bunch of students wearing strange masks. Upon figuring out that "Little Angel" Tatsuya is a God candidate, Goro sets out with Koki and Chika to stop him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Massugu de, Tsuyoi, Anata ni wa
So Upright and Strong
まっすぐで, 強い, あなたには

REGULAR.description:
Goro accidentally bought two tickets for his favorite idol Iyo`s concert, so he invites Koki along. After learning that Koki has become a KamiErabi God candidate in Tatsuya`s place, Goro ends up running into Iyo in a men`s bathroom just prior to the show.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Form, Voice, Memories, and Even the Pain
Sugata mo, Koe mo, Kioku mo, Sono Itami made
姿も, 声も, 記憶も, その痛みまで

REGULAR.description:
Honoka attempts to murder Goro, who`s currently incapacitated due to the repeated use of his power. But after Koki and Lall hinder her, a frustrated Honoka encounters Chika while attempting to leave the hospital. Events then take a turn for the bizarre.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Close Your Eyes, Cover Your Ears, and Afterwards
Me o Tsubutte, Mimi o Fusaide, Sono Ato
目を瞑って, 耳を塞いで, そのあと

REGULAR.description:
During Goro`s recovery celebration at the arcade, sexy actress Mitsuko suddenly climbs out of the TV. She asks for help rescuing her friend from a meddling God candidate named Keita. Meanwhile, Honoka tries to get info about other candidates from Chika.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Introductions Will Have to Wait
Jikoshoukai wa Atomawashitte Koto de
自己紹介は後回しってことで

REGULAR.description:
Falsely branded as fugitives, Goro`s group forms a new alliance with Honoka and Chika. They use Mitsuko`s power to leap through space and escape Keita`s attack, but a navigational blunder on Mitsuko`s part leads them to a surprise acquaintance of Keita`s.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Took a Trip, Where Would You Want to Go?
Ryokou Iku nara Doko Ikitai?
旅行行くならどこ行きたい?

REGULAR.description:
Honoka, Koki, and Chika find themselves forced into a harrowing battle against Kyo. Goro and Iyo begin to question their own powers and the true significance of the KamiErabi. Iyo presses Lall for information, but she claims to not remember anything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futte Iru no wa, Ame ja Nai
It`s Not Rain That`s Falling
降っているのは, 雨じゃない

REGULAR.description:
Kyo died young before a treatment could be found for his disease, but Ryo wished him back into being when she became a God candidate. Now Kyo has full control of the parallel worlds Ryo creates, and he asks Goro to help him establish a utopia for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mada Bokura made, Hikari ga Todoite Inainda
The Light Hasn`t Reached Us Yet
まだ僕らまで, 光が届いていないんだ

REGULAR.description:
Goro succeeds in stopping Kyo and Ryo, but the use of his power robs him of the relationships he`s established with his fellow God candidates. Lall alone remains by his side, and Goro confronts his own past in order to recall his long-forgotten true wish.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Wish Belongs to Me
Watashi no Negai Damono
私の願いだもの
Kamierabi
KamiErabi GOD.app
カミエラビ
神选
GOD.app
